paper_abstract: This paper is concerned with robust stabilization of linear differential inclusion systems with time delay. A nonlinear feedback law is established by using convex hull quadratic Lyapunov functions to make the state exponentially stable. An example is given to illustrate the effectiveness of the proposed method. (C) 2009 IMACS. Published by Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Robust stabilization of linear differential inclusion system with time delay
